1.content: Research optimal posting times and frequencies for major social media platforms
1.details: 1. Research YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, Facebook posting patterns. 2. Analyze audience behavior data and algorithm preferences. 3. Study engagement metrics and growth patterns. 4. Document platform-specific best practices and recommendations.

2.details: 1. Create database schema for platform-specific timing data. 2. Design API endpoints for scheduling optimization. 3. Build algorithm for optimal posting time calculation. 4. Integrate with existing batch processing system.

3.details: 1. Create platform timing data service. 2. Build scheduling optimizer with AI recommendations. 3. Add content calendar integration. 4. Implement automated posting time suggestions.

4.content: Build scheduling interface in web application
4.details: 1. Create scheduling dashboard component. 2. Add platform-specific timing recommendations. 3. Build content calendar view. 4. Implement batch job scheduling interface.

5.content: Create testing and documentation for scheduling features
5.details: 1. Test scheduling optimization algorithms. 2. Validate platform timing recommendations. 3. Create user guide for scheduling features. 4. Document API endpoints and integration examples.
